title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: LTC Gains 4.9% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) joined Litecoin (LTC) as a top performer, gaining 4.8%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3233.37, up 2.6% (+83.05) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+4.9%) and DOT (+4.8%).

Laggards: BTC (+1.6%) and ETH (+1.8%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: All 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with significant gains for top performers like LTC and DOT.
